DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, randomized study in subjects with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia receiving highly effective statins to assess the safety, efficacy and tolerability of Bococizumab (PF-04950615; RN316) to lower LDL-C.
DOC.brief_title: A 52 Week Study To Assess The Use Of Bococizumab (PF-04950615; RN316) In Subjects With Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Treated with a statin. Fasting LDLC > 70 mg/dL and triglyceride <=400 mg/dL. High or very high risk of incurring a cardiovascular event. Heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia. Pregnant or breastfeeding females. Cardiovascular or cerebrovascular event of procedures during the past 30 days. Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV. Poorly controlled hypertension.
